website_summaries.verdict: This pad's anti-slip finish helps keep it place on your shoulders while you squat.
pros: Made from high-density, thick foam rubber
Multiple open and close cell foam absorb shock
Easy installation – just slip the bar pad onto the bar
Anti-slip matte finish reduces slip risk
Comes in a variety of colors
Helps protect the knees and shoulders
cons: Be careful to keep the slit on the top, or your shoulders can knock it off the bar

customer_reviews.title: Great padding but can't hold up to the heavier weight
customer_reviews.text: For hip thrusts, I loved this pad for about 3 weeks...and then this happened. It's the same thing that has happened to every squat pad I've ever used. Once the weight gets above 350 or so, they just start to break down. I even pair the pad with a hard foam kneeling pad that mechanics use, and the bite of the bar is still too much. I did like the Iron Bull brand, so I ordered another and I've covered it in duct tape to see if it will help. Fingers crossed! For lighter weight, I would still highly recommend this pad.
customer_reviews.author: katiet310

customer_reviews.title: This pad is super thick and makes hip thrusts much easier
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute life changer!! I use it for hip thrusts. I am very very thin and I've tried using a yoga pad and the pad at the gym, but they still did not stop the pain of the bar. This pad is super thick and makes hip thrusts much easier. No more sore and bruised hip bones for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mout’s

customer_reviews.title: Gives the most cushion you can find in a squat pad/ barbell cushion
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of different barbell pads which I usually end up losing. I recently lost the red one of these, and when I ordered a different brand I noticed the difference right away and had to come back and order one of these. This barbell pad gives you the most cushion you can find which is essential for hip thrusts and squats. This one has lasted me a long time because its color stands out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pad ever, commercial gym use
customer_reviews.text: Great pad. Im a manager at my gym. Bought two of these pads in the blue color. Everyone loves em. Trainers, women for their backs, men for their pelvis! There is a dip in the pad as displayed. This is apparently especially useful for men doing pelvic thrusts with barbells! Pad is thick, firm. Very good quality. Fits our preset bars and standard barbells and Smith machine. Easy to wipe clean if needed. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BlK  C4t

customer_reviews.title: Makes a world of difference
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'm not your average pumper-of-iron. I'm in my mid-50's, could stand to lose a few (dozen) pounds, and work out at a budget conscious gym. I feel kind of silly carrying specialist equipment like this around with me. Whatever embarrassment I feel is by far overcome by the improvement this gizmo makes in my ability to do a decent barbell squat. Since buying it, I've been able to drop lower and work out my glutes/hamstrings to the proper degree of fatigue because the ruddy bar isn't digging into my neck and making me wimp out too soon. What. A. Revelation. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The squat pad arrived very fast and the quality is good. Time will tell how durable it is, but nothing so far leads me to believe it won't last. My son noted that it is a little firm compared to those he has use at school, but I think it is just about the right amount of support vs. comfort. Much better than no squat pad for sure! There is definitely an element of taste to the softness; for me it is just right.
customer_reviews.author: mmoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for spreading the load
customer_reviews.text: This works great to help distribute the weight of the bar across your neck and back/shoulders....to a point. That's why it's getting 4 stars. I would say it's good for up to about 350 pounds or so. After that, it doesn't fare so well and needs to be a bit thicker. Had they said this was good up to XXX amount of weight, I would probably have given it 5 stars. Wife and I especially like the neck cutout for comfort. So far, it hasn't broken down a bit and has retained its shape/size after repeated heavy lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Squatting is never easy, but with this pad, at least it’s comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The pain in my shoulders from the bar would often keep me from squatting. I would opt for dumbbells or kettlebell on leg day. I purchased this squat pad and WOW! I am able to squat again. And, I can use more weight! Fits perfectly on the smith machine bar (or any bar!) and is super thick...soft enough for comfort but also feels sturdy. My quads aren’t too happy with my purchase, but I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Long

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is great for anyone who is sensitive on skin and it hurts to hold alot of wait on your back when squatting. I had alot of trouble squatting with the bar directly on my shoulders/back, but with this I can go heavier and longer. I have had this for several months now and it is still in mint condition. I use it every single week for squatting. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the investment if you hip thrust.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for hip thrusts. I used it with 155 lbs and don't feel a a thing on my hips. So worth the money. You will love having your own instead of using the dirty and sweaty one at your local gym. Update: I've had it for a while now and its still.in perfect condition. The heaviest set I've done is 180. I ONLY use it for hip thrust and I take good care of it. Don't leave it in my car in the scorching heat.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda ihc

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for squats!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a Walmart brand pad, and it would slide and roll. The Iron bull is a very good option. It stays put and allows you to center the barbell on your shoulders comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: L. Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad! I usually use it for hip thrusts
customer_reviews.text: Mainly use it for hip thrusts. Pro’s: • Stays in place, hugs the bar tight while you do your sets. I don’t need to put in any straps/Velcro around it • Pretty comfortable, not too soft that it squishes to the bar, not to hard that it makes it uncomfortable • Not stubborn, so I can take it out easily when I’m done Con’s: • Can’t think of any, just a solid product all around for what it’s supposed to do Overall: I like it, would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: marsse

customer_reviews.title: Pad easily rolls on Olympic bars. Watch out for slitted area to roll toward your body
customer_reviews.text: Hip thrusts. Not squatting 😂. I’ve had to use an old wrist wrap to keep this thing on the bar facing up. It did not come with any straps of its own. As you all may know, while executing reps of hip thrusts, it’s imperative that the open slit on the pad stays far away from your skin. Without using my old wrist wrap to secure it, this adjustment had to be each set; sometimes having to stop a set to readjust. This is not a good thing. All in all, I love this foam pad with my wrist wrap addition.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushion!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, it absorbs all the pressure your shoulders would receive from the bar. This is important only if you don’t feel comfortable with the bar applying pressure to your shoulders, got as a gift for my girlfriend in pink color, making it a perfect gym item for her and got me interested in getting one for myself. Interms of durability it really just depends how often you do squats or chest. Long story short a perfect gym item to prevent injury from equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've never really used a squat pad, but my wife wanted one for our new home gym for that hip thrust thing they do with a bar haha, well I used this for squats too and it's super comfortable and makes the crappy experience more enjoyable. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: B-lo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for casual fitness
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, it's comfortable and I'm using it on a Rogue fitness bar. Originally bought it for my wife but then decided I also enjoy the comfort. I imagine at higher squat weights it would collapsed, but for casual lifting its more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hip thrusts
customer_reviews.text: This pad works amazing for hip thrusts with the squat bar. Even though I am very thin this protects my pelvis so I can lift 265 and counting without any pain!!! what a difference my lift numbers will just continue to rise now Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Kate M Walker

customer_reviews.title: Iron Bull barbell pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great barbell pad for hip thrusts. My gym is always lacking in barbell pads and with frequent use, they do tear. I decided to order my own so I no longer have to search for one. I used this for the first time today and feel that is is going to help me reach 300 lbs soon. Without the pad, I can't do nearly as much weight.
customer_reviews.author: nobody

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Pad!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really liked this. The only thing that was a little bit irritating was that there is no strap. It just meant I had to be careful to make sure the bar hadn’t rotated between squat sets. Not a huge deal, but straps would definitely fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy and sturdy, but moves with 15kg womens barbell
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this. I love the color. Firm cushion for squats and hip thrusts. However, I really didn't think about the size of my barbell before I ordered this. I'm sure it would be great for the regular 20kg barbell with thicker bar, but I have the 15kg women's barbell at 25mm so when doing squats the pad moves a bit. No biggie. Overall this is a great pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Buy the product you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Male. 6’5 215lb built like a brick SH. Great product. Only use for heavy hip thrusts. Above 200lbs the foam compresses a bit which I’m sure is normal as it’s not the highest density foam but it makes the thrusts at higher weight bearable and has good middle relief for my giant man parts that invariably get all up in the way of everything especially at the apex of my superb thrusting. Ladies... r in trouble
customer_reviews.author: Big Knee

customer_reviews.title: Ok - but heavily chemical smells...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is ok, but the material itself smells of chemical processing. I’ve even noticed a little wet residue can be pinched out of the material. In light of that, I make sure to keep a barrier between it and my skin. Hoping that eventually it will “dry out” and I won’t have to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Needs straps
customer_reviews.text: This product came fast with prime but a little disappointed to find out it doesn't fit my standard barbell. In that matter it doesn't stay on. I had to tape it up and I can't take it to the gym now. Had to buy another one. Needs some straps at least.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Hip Thrust for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I love this squat pad. I use it to do hip thrust and for squats ! It helps out alot and really sturdy. Typically when I do Hip Thrust without it I can feel the bar hitting my bones and its uncomfortable with this pad it makes it more comfortable and i can go heavier on the weights ! I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kam1230

customer_reviews.title: allows more weights to be used
customer_reviews.text: by not having the bar dig into my shoulders, I have been able to add on 50 to 90 more pounds to the bar. it does have an odor, but that could be because I store it in its bag.
customer_reviews.author: joe m

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder, thigh and hip saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, really helps with a loaded bar. Really helps when doing barbell hip thrusts, bar doesnt dig into bone or smash thighs. Have no complaints at all with the product and was priced cery well. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Recently started lifting and squatting, and I wouldn't get through many squats due to the pressure/pain from the bar. This squat pad has changed the game and I can concentrate on proper form and adding weight instead of the pain from the bar. The pad fits perfectly on both our thicker and thinner bars. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ada Chang

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS FISHY
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice if you're girly like me and it serves it's purpose but the minute I opened it , IT SMELLED LIKE FISH!! YUCK! Still does after 2 months of use. I cant put my towel next to it because then my towel also will catch that fish smell from this item. Horrible smell. Also , I notice this item stains easily so looks dirty too fast. I wish they could do something to make the product durable and wont get stained so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny T

customer_reviews.title: After I was able to put 35 pounds on each ...
customer_reviews.text: After I was able to put 35 pounds on each side of the bar, I reached a stopping point because the weight was hurting my neck and shoulders. With this device, I am finally able to progress further. It takes so much off of your shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great design
customer_reviews.text: Loved using this. It’s super comfortable and is easy off and on use. I would definitely recommend this. Not sure on the durability due to the fact I haven’t had it long. But it seems quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sturma

customer_reviews.title: Solid product and exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as listed. its a good size with lots of padding. use it on an Olympic bar and it makes a huge difference in comfort. I would totally recommend this product if your in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to clean, definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy to have added to to our home gym set-up. It has definitely helped up my max reps on squats due to extra comfort on the neck/shoulder area. Have recommended to other new lifters.... Holds up well and wipes down easily.
customer_reviews.author: southern_coder

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works.
customer_reviews.text: After trying several cheaper versions I'm glad I found this one. It actually works. Most others are nothing more than pipe insulation with a upholstered cover that eventually (within 3 workouts) collapse under the weight and are no different than having the bare bar laying across your back. This one is thick, closed cell foam that doesn't break down. It's comfortable. It works. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for barbell hip thrusts
customer_reviews.text: This pad is perfect for protecting the hips during barbell hip thrust. It feels comfortable even with 325 lbs. I haven't had it very long but it still looks like new and seems to be holding up well so I am hopeful for many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: M21DRAGON

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hip Thrusts
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING for hip thrusts. I used to do the yoga mat roll to give myself comfort on 500lb+ hip thrusts, but I feel good with just this now
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Egg

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this pad. Helps pad her shoulders when doing squats and the cutout portion in the middle makes it comfortable for her neck..
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Cute gym gear
customer_reviews.text: I revived this and immediately loved it! It helps me with hip thrusts and is so thick and spongy it doesn’t hurt as bad to do them! I would definitely recommend looks very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: KROD

customer_reviews.title: You Must get one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer... ladies guys think a pad that yours, you know where it’s been and it’s so comfy! I wish I had found this months ago. I am not doing tons of weight but this pad is still super helpful, the best part is it’s clean!
customer_reviews.author: McLane

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return this item. It is terrible. It does not stay on the bar as the opening is too big. It also is too bulky and is not comfortable for a small woman. How do we return this?
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Opening too big
customer_reviews.text: The material and thickness of this pad was great. However, I returned it because the opening where the bar goes is way too big. When I did hip thrusts, which was the sole exercise I need the pad for, it wasn't stable. I have boney hips and the pad slipped out, causing the bar to smash into my hip bone. If you are looking for a product for a similar reason as me, then I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annastasia Black

customer_reviews.title: No Bruising!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for hip thrusters! Also, I saw a number of folks wishing they had one while they sharked around the floor, looking for one of the smelly, sweaty, bacteria-infested pads someone else had finished abusing.
customer_reviews.author: J&S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This pad is great! My gym recently reopened and the Squat bar pads were put away because let's face it, not a great idea to have everyone using the same ones. I decided to find one for myself and this pad is absolutely perfect sturdy fits on bar snuggly and feels very comfortable on my neck. I purchased the pink one and now I don't have to worry whether it has been cleaned etc, love it!
customer_reviews.author: catherine stafford

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this. I thought this would be easier when working out since the bar is so hard, but it didn’t help any.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love the color.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I was surprised to see the red one was cheaper, but it worked out perfectly for me since that's the one I wanted. Only downfall... if you hip thrust on the smith machine, the bar might be too thick to fit in it correctly. You'll still be able to use it with the smith though. Other than that, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen R.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: No complaints but I would suggest going with black. I went with turquoise and you can see little smudges here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancée to use at the gym and I also use it once in a while. I have used this while hip-thrusting 300+ pounds with no discomfort, same for squats. It works great!! We also use it for seated calf-raises and a few other bar exercises. Going on 6 months of use with no issues or damage to it.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia. E

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Functional, Color choices
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of use (no Velcro) and the neck relief cut helps comfort by placing the load more on the shoulders. Great for hip thrusts as well. The fact that it comes in red and matches the rest of my equipment is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Josepí

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This pad is great! I use for heavy weight pelvic raises and it provides perfect cushioning. I recommend this to anyone needing a barbell pad. Honestly never squatted with it, then again I'm no sissy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Helen VanDusen

customer_reviews.title: Increases comfort in the gym!
customer_reviews.text: This pad is perfect for working out! I love how easily it slips onto any barbell, helpful in performing squats or hip thrusts. Pad is very cushy highly recommend if you want to lift without discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Estelle

customer_reviews.title: The cushioning that you didn't know you needed
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a good month now, I love squatting with this. Makes the neck and upper back feel so much better. I would always see a ton of bruising back there. This definitely resolved those issues!
customer_reviews.author: Julio Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: From what I read this seemed like a good pad. With light use the foam quickly started cracking so my husband tried to fix it. Now the pad just slides all over the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Princess

customer_reviews.title: Thick padding, not enough grip
customer_reviews.text: The biggest appeal was how thick and comfortable the padding is. However, after some use and wear, it doesn't grip on the bar as tightly, and slips off
customer_reviews.author: Orange for reference

customer_reviews.title: Great for private use.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I notices a lot of gyms use this brand so I decided to give it a try. And I can say for private use its a keeper. I've been using it religiously for a few months now with my gym partner and it does not nave a single sign of wear and tear on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pressure on my shoulders
customer_reviews.text: So cute too. Nice padding and helps with glute bridges too. The bright pink identifies it as mine and helps me remember to bring it with me.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered two of these so far! I love my pad. I don’t go without it at the gym now. Smells immediately out of the packaging but after airing out for a few days the smell dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: High quality device
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful addition to my gym bag accessories. Much better than generic pipe insulators, it fits surely and is more ergonomically shaped to provide both comfort and protection of the anatomy of the traps, lower neck and shoulders. This alleviates the distracting painful lifting and possibly injurious physical adjustments that I have experienced with a "raw" bar or suboptimal equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Mims-Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hip thrusts at the gym, the pads they usually have are really gross looking and thin. I have his thrusted 315 lbs with this thing and didn't feel any pain at all! Definitely get it.
customer_reviews.author: pinklover1313

customer_reviews.title: This pad is very comfortable and cushions the spine perfectly
customer_reviews.text: All the guys call this a "sissy" pad....I call it a "smart" pad. As a chiropractor I see how without a pad a squatting bar can create a callous on the upper thoracic vertebra which means too much stress is being put on this area. This pad is very comfortable and cushions the spine perfectly. Not everyone has massive back muscles to "lift" the bar off of the spine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodd!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, the purple is a bit wider for a bigger bar so slides on smaller. The black is smaller. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: all serious lifters need this!!
customer_reviews.text: i got this because my rec center at college didn’t have one. this is SO much better than a traditional squat pad. i use it for hip thrusts and i have 0 bruising on my hips ever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects shoulders and easily fits inside gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Protects neck/shoulders/back while doing squats. (I even use this for power squats with a jump at the end and it works as expected.) Unreally like the smaller size that fits inside my gym bag. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: James A Raine

customer_reviews.title: This is the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Been trying different pads for squats over the years, most have been very disappointing. This is the best I've used. I feel very comfortable with it.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl S. Cully

customer_reviews.title: MUCH more comfortable while doing barbell squats
customer_reviews.text: I'm MUCH more comfortable now while I do full barbell squats! Careful to have the slit pointing up. If the slit is pointing down...BOING...your shoulders will pop it off the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I originally rated this five stars because it was very comfortable. However, once I've increased my weights the band now pops off the barbell the second I try to get into position, and the barbell bruises my hips every time. Thus 1 star for comfort because it isnt there to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product, beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using black one with many of my clients for hip thrusts mainly, and I had to order another, but pink one. It is high quality and very soft, comfortable for hip hinge movement. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Zeljkovic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Secures perfectly to the standard bar my gym uses. Got it in red so no one at the gym thinks it's public property lol.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a month now. I use it for leg day (3 days out of the week) and I do hip trusts, squats, and so on... I use it a lot, and I’ve noticed it’s very sturdy and doesn’t slip. It’s also very comfortable it makes my workout so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy support for frequent squatters
customer_reviews.text: A very useful product! It alleviates the spinal stress of the barbell during squats well. Helps me to place more focus on the movement as opposed to the pain of a 250lb loaded barbell balancing on my neck back.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: confortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife while doing squats. She finds it confortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry and stiff
customer_reviews.text: Started coming apart 8 months after purchase. I have pieces everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I ordered pink and received red
customer_reviews.text: Otherwise it does what it says it does. I really wanted the pink but it wasn't worth the hassle to return and re-order just to get the color I wanted. Order fulfillment should do a better job with attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: My title says it all. This item is perfect. Easy to use, and makes lifting SO comfortable. Great for squats, and also for the hip thrusts my wife does. I honestly feel like I did better on my squats due to the comfort of this pad. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Always Better Challenge Show

customer_reviews.title: Seems very durable !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product itself but a little disappointed in the color . I ordered a blue one to match my gym and equipment and it arrived like an aqua/teal girlie blue . . Good thing I have a home gym and workout alone lol . Great pad for what it's for though !!!
customer_reviews.author: DEREK

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. Looks like it will last me forever. Im glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hip thrusts and it provides the cushioning needed superbly. I've had it for a few months now and it is not showing any signs of wear or tear. Easy to get on and off the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Should have a velcro strap. It's only slightly annoying to have to keep the exposed part on the top of the bar
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far it feels great,sturdy and very comfortable. Time will tell if it doesn’t hold onto the barbell as it does now.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Timothy J Dunn

customer_reviews.title: ... give it two stars only because the padding is nice. The downside is it doesn’t stay on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give it two stars only because the padding is nice. The downside is it doesn’t stay on the bar well. I did three sets of squats and for two out of the three I had to put the pad back on. If the bar rolls before you get to the proper spot on your neck with the pad, be prepared for it to fall off. The next pad I buy will have straps to secure it. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: JennB20

customer_reviews.title: Great! Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my hip thrusts and it helps a lot. I enjoy it! One day I went to the gym and forgot to bring it. My gym has similar items we can use, but I felt the difference using my gym's squat pad and this one. This one is far superior. Also, it's pink and makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Aile

customer_reviews.title: oh so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: but not a great buy if you planned on going heavy, this will be useless in a month.
customer_reviews.author: eroina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so well! I needed my own pad at the gym because people never put it back in the right place and it was always an “I spy” or “hide and seek” kinda moment during my glute or leg days. It’s comfortable. Fits the barbell perfectly. Easy to adjust. And the blue color is adorable!!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Great pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the best squat shoulder pad I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Provides great padding
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I am able to use it across my lap and lift without pain in my hip bones which was my main reason for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: This pad makes it possible for me to be able to do back squats and lunges. Without it, the bar was just too uncomfortable even with little to no weight on it (probably due to previous spine surgery at c5-7). I've tried rolled up towels but they would slip off center and provided no cushioning whatsoever. This item was well worth the money, I always have it in my gym bag now.
customer_reviews.author: msjlshopper

customer_reviews.title: Yessss
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it works great, no more tender hips and shoulders for squats and hip raises. And the pink is easy to spot when I’m running out the door.
customer_reviews.author: J9er

customer_reviews.title: Good for back pain
customer_reviews.text: The pad really helped reduce the pain of the barbell on your back (or wherever you use it) while providing great comfort. Very durable and easy to attach to the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pad for the barbell. I use is for heavy hip thrusts on the regular. My pad did come with a white smudge of some sort and a little dented on the side but in no way does any of that effect the use of the pad. This is my second iron bull bar pad, the first I bought over a year ago and I just had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty fast. Has just the right amount of cushion. Has a weird plastic smell im sure it will go away with some time
customer_reviews.author: Well Since You Asked

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love this barbell pad for heavy hip thrusts. It’s thick and great quality. I never feel pain when I’m using it. I’ve had it a couple months now and it’s held up great. Very durable and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my barbell pad
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my barbell pad. i love doing squats and glute bridges but would never do as often as i would have liked because the bar always left residual pain on my neck or hips. this pad is nice and thick and i have no residual pain after exercising. very comfortable during. the only thing i would say is that sometimes the pad rotates and comes part way off the bar. but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sadi

customer_reviews.title: Iron Bull Squat Pad easy on the neck & shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly satisfied with this product. Great cushioning for the back of the neck and shoulders which make my squat workouts bearable! I highly recommend this squat pad to anyone experiencing neck and shoulder pain caused by the bar during their squat workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon V.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - great color options
customer_reviews.text: Good for use at the local gym. Good quality; recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LM_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent squat pad.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pad that I’ve bought since we lost the first one. bottom line, it works.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: ... really use these for hip thrusts and they work amazing. No need for extra padding as the foam ...
customer_reviews.text: I really use these for hip thrusts and they work amazing. No need for extra padding as the foam is soft but thick enough to hold the loads I pile on. I have not actually used it for squats since I'm not in a heavy phase right now, but it's so comfy I know it will help if the time comes that I need it. Durable and comfy. Bright enough so I know I'll never forget it, and I know it's mine ;)
customer_reviews.author: Renee Untalan

customer_reviews.title: 20$ pool noodle
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok but idk for 20$ I was so excited to get this so I could stop using my pool noodle with Velcro and to my surprise, no way to affix it to the bar I.e. straps or wrap or Velcro. I just paid 20 buck for a chunk of pool noodle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Neck saver
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I didn’t buy thus sooner. It’s a neck saver!
customer_reviews.author: kelckeldo

customer_reviews.title: Wish it fit the standard bar
customer_reviews.text: Rating a 3 because i wish it fit snugly over the barbell. I have to make sure to position the pad and myself/bar correctly otherwise it pops right off.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best hip thrusting pad ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pad is amazing! It's soooo thick and great quality. I was hip thrusting with a folded yoga mat before purchasing this and had huge bruises on my hips all the time so couldn't go as heavy as I wanted, now I am happily thrusting 170kg+ and can't feel the barbell at all on my hips :-) 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. Allowed me to start adding weights to my 45 lb bar without the pain on my neck and shoulders from the extra grippy bar. ♡ Squat Booty coming this fall thanks to Iron bull. Lol
customer_reviews.author: MeganRaye

customer_reviews.title: It sits perfectly and comfortable. I have a very bony neck and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This has made barbell squats SOOO much nicer. The bar hurts my neck and back to an extreme without this pad. It sits perfectly and comfortable. I have a very bony neck and it applies the perfect amount of cushion. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Poisson

product_meta.title: Iron Bull Strength Advanced Squat Pad - Barbell Pad for Squats, Lunges & Hip Thrusts - Neck & Shoulder Protective Pad Support
product_meta.description:
The World's Most Advanced Squat Pad by Iron Bull Strength
Everyone knows squatting is the king of all exercises. But squatting in pain can become very difficult physically and psychologically to perform. Iron Bull Strength's new Advanced Squat Pad allows you to comfortably perform your squats, lunges and hip thrusts pain free!

Lift Heavier Weight Without Discomfort Now!
Our 16" long x 3.5" wide bar pad is the most comfortable bar pad on the market. With our ergonomic design, the carved area matches your neck's profile with a 1.25" thick foam pad positioning the weight in line with your body and spreading the weight across your shoulders. No more pain and discomfort due to the weight sitting on your neck and spine! 

Sculpt and tone with ultimate comfort!
You know the king of all booty exercises is the hip thrust to build strong and round glutes. But thrusters can hurt doing them and can even discourage you from doing them at all! Well we solved your problem thanks to this incredible hip pad. You can now concentrate on the squeeze and burn of your glutes completely pain free and finally get that perfect peach butt! You can finally train comfortably and make super-fast progress; which means super-fast gains!

The Bottom Line
If you're looking for the best squat pad on the market, look no further. The ergonomic design allows you to perform your exercises pain free thus allowing you to focus on your form and increase performance. Additionally, the Advanced Squat Pad is made of shock-absorbing high-density foam rubber reducing shocks on your spine. Our anti-slip matte finish ensures the weight positions and stays on your shoulders while you squat. The quick-slip design makes installation fast and easy in a matter of seconds only! Just clip on the bar and start building muscle!
feature_bullets: ✅ ERGONOMIC BARBELL PAD: Our squat pad has been designed for even weight distribution across the shoulders, relieving neck pressure while squatting. The Advanced Squat Pad allows you to focus on your form without pain.
✅ HIGH QUALITY: Made from high-quality, high-density, thick foam rubber for increased durability. Multiple open and close cell foam, absorbing all shocks for increased comfort and reduced injury.

✅ NO STRAPS NEEDED: Our bar pad features our Quick-Slip design for easy and fast installation on any barbell. It fits any bar without movement. Just clip the bar pad on the bar and start exercising! No need for ridiculous straps around the pad.
✅ ANTI-SLIP SURFACE: Our anti-slip matte finish to reduce risk of slippage and increase grip on the shoulders.

✅ NO PAIN, MORE GAIN: Relieve painful pressure on your neck and vertebrae while you squat allowing you to focus on your lift! No more pressure points on your hips or pubis. Simply clip the bar pad and concentrate on your workout! Perfect size to fit in your gym bag!
